holidays.description: The official children’s day of Germany, one of two children’s days recognized in Germany every year.

holidays.description: A successful community is one that provides healthcare, education, and emotional care to its children.

holidays.title: National Crime and Intelligence Analyst Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Take a minute to learn about the importance these professionals play in combating crime!

holidays.title: National Fried Rice Day
holidays.description: Fulfill your inner cravings with this amazing dish as we celebrate Fried Rice Day.

holidays.title: National Punch Day
holidays.description: It's not really soda, not really juice and not completely a cocktail.

holidays.title: National School Backpack Awareness Day
holidays.description: Improper use can lead to back pain or injury, which can impact learning.

holidays.title: National String Cheese Day
holidays.description: Join the foodie bandwagon as this snack strings you along to culinary bliss.

holidays.title: Ellie Louise’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ellie Louise is amazing because of her positivity and fitness — we're proud of her achievements!

holidays.title: Jack Hemmings’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jack Hemmings made a name for himself — he’s destined to do much more!

holidays.title: Khabib Nurmagomedov’s Birthday

holidays.title: Sophia Loren’s Birthday

holidays.title: Tara Wallace’s Birthday
